AudioManager
MonoBehaviour
public
AudioManager

Manages audio playback and volume control.

Variables
sounds
[SerializeField]
private Sound[] sounds

Array of sounds effects.

musics
[SerializeField]
private Sound[] musics

Array of music tracks.

audioMixer
[SerializeField]
private AudioMixer audioMixer

Reference to the audio mixer.

music
[SerializeField]
private AudioMixerGroup music

Audio mixer group for music.

SFX
[SerializeField]
private AudioMixerGroup SFX

Audio mixer group for sound effects.

volume
private float volume

Current volume level.

masterSlider
[SerializeField]
private Slider masterSlider

Slider for master volume.

musicSlider
[SerializeField]
private Slider musicSlider

Slider for music volume.

SFXSlider
[SerializeField]
private Slider SFXSlider

Slider for sound effects volume.

Functions
Awake
private void Awake()

This method is called right before the Start method. Here are loaded all the sound clips.

Start
private void Start()

This method gets from the PlayerPrefs the master, music and SFX volumes.

Update
private void Update()
Play
public void Play(
string name
)

Plays a sound effect by name.

Parameter
name
string

The name of the sound effect.

PlayMusic
public void PlayMusic()

Plays a random music track.

SetMasterVolume
public void SetMasterVolume(
float volume
)

Sets the master volume level.

Parameter
volume
float

The volume level (range: -80 to 0).

SetMusicVolume
public void SetMusicVolume(
float volume
)

Sets the music volume level.

Parameter
volume
float

The volume level (range: -80 to 0).

SetSFXVolume
public void SetSFXVolume(
float volume
)

Sets the sound effects volume level.

Parameter
volume
float

The volume level (range: -80 to 0).
